Posts.Content: Embraced wrote: I've heard of some choosing their drs, but I love my primary care physician, who referred me to my breast surgeon, who referred me to my oncologist, who referred me to my plastic surgeon.  My medical team is being beautifully put together for me.  This may be a wonderful thing, but I was just wondering if anyone out there has been treated by Dr.  Goz Yerevanian (breast surgeon), Dr. Crucitt (Oncologist), or Dr. Gilbert Lee (plastic surgeon)?  They are all in San Diego, CA.  My breast surgeon feels that Dr. Lee is the best plastic surgeon in all of San Diego.  I'd really like a consumer's opionion as well. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Consumer Report for Drs. Embraced Embraced
